about_the_game:
Experience an engaging preview of Soulbond, diving into the captivating prologue that introduces the main characters and unveils the initial mysteries of this unique visual novel. The demo offers an in-depth look at the narrative, featuring meaningful choices, intriguing contract negotiations, and a point-and-click experience that puts you in control.

Features

  • Immersive Narrative: Explore a compelling prologue and uncover the secrets that await in the halls of Hell;
  • Memorable Characters: Meet the main characters, each with their unique personality and intertwined stories;
  • Choices that Matter: Make decisions that shape the course of the story, providing a personalized experience;
  • Contract Negotiation: Engage in strategic negotiations, adjusting clauses to influence the fate of the characters;
  • Point-and-Click Exploration: Immerse yourself in the setting of Hell, collect items, and unlock secrets with the intuitive point-and-click system.


Note:
This demo is a preview of what's to come in the full game. Stay tuned for future updates!

content_descriptors.notes: Notice: This game includes religious thematics, explicit language, sexual innuendos, prostitution, and mild violence/blood descriptions.
